name: JW Marriott Mumbai Juhu
shortDescription: Celebrate beachfront glamour at JW Marriott Juhu, Mumbai's premier Arabian Sea resort offering stunning sunsets, expansive venues, and sophisticated celebrations.
longDescription: JW Marriott Mumbai Juhu occupies a prime beachfront position on the Arabian Sea, offering Mumbai celebrations the rare combination of beach glamour and urban accessibility. The hotel's oceanfront lawns, sunset views, and sophisticated venues create a resort atmosphere within the city.
metaTitle: JW Marriott Juhu Wedding | Beachfront Mumbai Wedding Venue
metaDescription: Host your beachfront wedding at JW Marriott Juhu Mumbai. Arabian Sea sunsets, grand venues for 800 guests, and sophisticated celebrations.
awards: Travel + Leisure Best Beach Resort Mumbai
address: Juhu Tara Road, Juhu, Mumbai 400049, India
